## PictureCollection.RemoveAt method

删除特定索引处的形状

```csharp
public void RemoveAt(int index)
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
//添加图片
int index2 = pictures.Add(1, 1, "image.png");
//删除
pictures.RemoveAt(index2);
```
